name: Caveman's Quest HD
description:
This is a fun puzzler that can be enjoyed by the whole family!

"The Evil Tribe attacked the village when all the men went for hunting. They captured all the young girls and wanted to sell them as slaves. Being the best warrior of the village, you are assigned to find all the girls and rescue them..."

Features:

- 80 well-designed puzzles
- 2 control modes: on screen keypad and innovative Swipe & Hold control
- solution playback
- animated help
